! parse
expectError 'pubsub.NewTopic cannot be called here. It must be called from a package level variable.'
err 'A pubsub topic cannot be declared here, they can only be declared in a package level variable.'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"

    "encore.dev/pubsub"
)

type MyMessage struct {}

//encore:api
func SomeAPI(ctx context.Context) error {
    topic := pubsub.NewTopic[MyMessage]("basic-topic")
    topic.Publish(ctx, &MyMessage{})
}
